thread.title: Clayton Kershaw outdueled by Jacob deGrom in Dodgers' NLDS loss - Denver Post
thread.title_full: Clayton Kershaw outdueled by Jacob deGrom in Dodgers' NLDS loss - Denver Post - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Denver Post
title: Clayton Kershaw outdueled by Jacob deGrom in Dodgers' NLDS loss - Denver Post
text:
The reigning NL MVP walked three in the seventh on the way to his fifth consecutive playoff defeat, getting outpitched by Jacob deGrom in the Los Angeles Dodgers' 3-1 loss to the New York Mets on Friday night in their NL Division Series opener. Kershaw's skid is the longest such streak in Dodgers' history.
 Denver Post.
